questions.explanation:
Woody.

	Everyone in the bar loved his chili.  He said it was an old family recipe - from an "old family that lived down the road".

questions.text: Who did Cliff say he had "fatherly feelings" about?
questions.explanation:
Dorothy, the weather-woman.

	Dorothy was on the Weather Channel. Cliff especially loved her lisp.

questions.text: What did Rebecca do with the poolroom?
questions.correct: Turned it into a tea room
questions.explanation:
Turned it into a tea room.

	Sam did not like it at all. For one, he wanted his poolroom back and for two, he simply hated it.

questions.text: Where was the pool table located in this episode?
questions.explanation:
In Sam's office.

	A ball came out of the office that Cliff hit too hard. Sam caught the ball.

questions.text: What did Rebecca tell Sam he was?
questions.explanation:
a butthead.

	Sam and Rebecca made a bet as to whether or not Rebecca could make $500 in one night in her tea room. She said she'd share all the profits with Sam. Sam said he'd could get half of nothing and retire.

questions.text: Who said he was "whipped and proud of it"?
questions.explanation:
Frasier.

	The guys tried to get him to stay in the bar and not go into the tea room. Lilith cleared her throat causing Frasier to say, "That's me, whipped and proud of it."

questions.text: Who told Lilith she was borderline anorexic?
questions.explanation:
Rebecca.

	Lilith told Rebecca that she and Frasier were both watching their diets, and only wanted tea.

questions.text: What helped Rebecca's tea room get business?
options: free cookies with every cup of tea
questions.explanation:
the chili.

	Sam was concerned he could lose his poolroom. Norm told him, "kiss your poolroom goodbye".

questions.text: Who did Sam call when trying to save his poolroom?
questions.explanation:
Fire marshal.

	Carla suggested that Sam rip out Rebecca's throat literally. Sam, however, decided to win by cheating.

questions.text: Who or what made Sam cry?
questions.correct: Rebecca broke all the windows in Sam's corvette
options: Rebecca destroyed the walls of Sam's bar
questions.explanation:
Rebecca broke all the windows in Sam's corvette.

	Sam told her he felt so badly for cheating that he could cry. She told him to go ahead and cry then. When he couldn't she "helped him" cry.
